column1: hey team hike saturday thinking going nandi hills sunrise wanting ages sounds fun difficulty level long would take need know make back family dinner moderate mostly paved steps take 2 hours start early say meet catch sunrise back bangalore noon easily start works bring bring bring big bottle water energy bars share camera also ready sunrise .

Nandi Hills is a moderate, mostly paved steps that should take about 2 hours up and down . Meeting at the base at 5:30 AM for the sunrise . Everyone should bring at least 1 litre of water, a cap, and light snacks .
